QuestData.Title: Lushroom Rush
QuestData.Description: Building a new village makes for hungry workers it seems!$B$BI have a hearty stew recipe prepared, but I need some lushrooms from the Tu Shen Burial Ground to the east. Apparently there are roused spirits causing trouble up there though, and I'm not very well suited for the violent life.$B$BIf you're heading up the burial grounds today, could you collect some lushrooms for me?
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Cooke Tope at Mistfall Village in the Vale of Eternal Blossoms.
